NTriples mode
-------------

. “literal 1” . \_:bnode3 . \_:bnode4 “literal 2”<span class="citation" data-cites="lang">@lang</span> . \_:bnode5 “literal 3”^^ .

**MIME types defined:** `text/n-triples`.
